snippet: FREY--Dale, was a source of both inspiration and courage to all who knew him. He was a special friend to me and the entire Palisade family. His guidance will be greatly missed. Dale's love for his family and his passion for helping others were evident in everything he did. We have all lost a good friend. Marty Berman and the Palisade Capital team 1/3
lead_paragraph: FREY--Dale, was a source of both inspiration and courage to all who knew him. He was a special friend to me and the entire Palisade family. His guidance will be greatly missed. Dale's love for his family and his passion for helping others were evident in everything he did. We have all lost a good friend. Marty Berman and the Palisade Capital team 1/3
